circumstances: While approaching Kenai, the crew encountered icing conditions. During a last turn to join the approach path, the twin engine aircraft stalled and crashed few km short of runway. All nine occupants were injured, four of them seriously.
probable_cause:
The accident was probably caused by the combination of the following factors: 
- The pilot failed to obtain/maintain flying speed, 
- Poorly planned approach,
- Aircraft not aligned with runway,
- Icing conditions, including sleet and freezing rain, 
- Fog,
- Heavy aircraft icing with ice fog encountered during circling approach, 
- Stalled during attempt to align with runway.
